W

wakeUp() - Method in class components.Branch
Lets the branch start work
wakeUp() - Method in class components.Customer
Waking up the tread
wakeUp() - Method in class components.Truck
Lets the truck start work again
wakeUpAllThreads() - Static method in class gui.buttonsPanel
Waking up all sleeping treads (Tracks, Branches, Costumers)
work() - Method in class components.Branch
This function performs a work unit in each beat according to the following requirements: For each package whose status is COLLECTION, if there is a vehicle available, he goes out to collect the package. For each package whose status is DELIVERY, if there is a vehicle available, he is sent to deliver the package.
work() - Method in class components.Customer
 
work() - Method in class components.Hub
This function performs a work unit in each beat according to the following requirements: Sends all available trucks to local branches in the order of the branch numbers. The truck will load all the packages waiting for it to be transferred to the branch to which it is traveling. If the non-standard truck is available, and there is a non-standard package in the sorting center that is waiting to be collected and its dimensions fit the truck, the truck will be sent to collect the package.
work() - Method in interface components.Node
Current node makes 1 unit of his specific work
work() - Method in class components.NonStandardTruck
Collect package from sander customer and deliver it to the destination.
work() - Method in class components.StandardTruck
Performs work according to the purpose of the trip If the vehicle is on its way, the clock shortens by a second When time left to arrive is 0 do the job according to the purpose of the trip:
Options: Deliver the packages to the HUB. Deliver the packages to their branch, and collect packages to deliver to HUB Trip ends when arriving at HUB
work() - Method in class components.Van
Performs work according to the purpose of the trip If the vehicle is on its way, the clock shortens by a second When time left to arrive is 0 do the job according to the purpose of the trip:
Options: Deliver it at the branch. Deliver it to costumer.
writeBackup(Memento) - Method in class components.CareTaker
Taking care about the "tracking.txt" file backup
